revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (3), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (3)

|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;; |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash3maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = SK hynix;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 32 |ram2chip = SK hynix;HY5DU561622ETP-D43; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Sky Light <!--Electronic (ShenZhen) Limited--> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/08/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00CKPMHSQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9331; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :The manufacturer's site is available: [http://www.sky-light.com.hk Sky Light]
"EP-SVA70MB-01" appears to be silkscreened on the removable ''[[Atheros]]'' wireless module. :The RAM chip P/N for the wireless module may be HY5DU561622ETP-D43 (32MB).
Specs from the FCC manual.. *14 Megapixel camera, shoots 1080p video @ 30 fps *180 degree super wide angle field of view *JPEG format photos *AAC audio compression w/ AGC *Average recording time of 4 hours (using 32 GB microSD card in 1080p30/720p60) *Up to 32GB microSD cards supported *Waterproof at a depth up to 10 meters *USB 2.0 Host (for charging and data transfer), HDMI, AV/Composite *1200mAh Li-ion battery, approx. 2 hours w/o Wi-Fi or 1 hour w/ Wi-Fi PODZ *Dimension: 40mm x 40mm x 108mm *Weight: ~127.8g (w/ PODZ), ~133.2g (w/ Wi-Fi PODZ)
===Models=== :;[[List of Camera Devices]] *[[ion Air Play]] Camera (1007) • ''iON America, LLC'' *[[ion Air Pro]] Camera (1014W) • LR44 • [https://www.amazon.com/iON-Camera-1014W-Air-Pro/dp/B00V3BPUXC/ B00V3BPUXC] *[[ion Air Pro Plus]] Camera (1010/1011) • [https://www.amazon.com/iON-Camera-Plus-Bike-Helmet/dp/B007N4EJMG/ B007N4EJMG] *[[ion Air Pro 2 Wi-Fi]] Camera (1023) • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00CKPMHSQ/ B00CKPMHSQ] *[[ion Air Pro 3 Wi-Fi]] Camera (1022) • [https://www.amazon.com/iON-Camera-Air-Pro-Wi-Fi/dp/B00H8H7MU4/ B00H8H7MU4]
